report.title: Dont Do Too Much Caffeine
report.author: Arson
report.bodytext: Having recently becoming broke and totally out of weed, i gathered all of my money (4.75) and went to min a desparate bid to get a buzz. I bought the largest # of caffeine pills for the cheapest price (36 for 3.00) and went home. I crushed 16 of them up and snorted a line, but it was icky. I realized how dumb it was to snort it and just ate 15 200 mg pills. /n /n THIS WAS THE BIGGEST FUCKING MISTAKE OF MY LIFE /n /n I took the pills at 11 O'Clock and by 11:30 i was feeling it. /n /n I was disoriented and incoherant to the person I was talking to on the phone. Soon I began to feel nauteaus(sp?) and ill. I realized my blunder and went to try and vomit the pills up. Unfortunatley, it was too late. /n /n The neausea was constant, but when I stood and tried to walk, it turned into full blown puking. I had to bathe my head in cold water just to calm the heaving. I spent most of my time laying on my couch with an ice bag on my head. I was vomiting until about 3 that morning. /n /n Words cannot describe how much I regret taking the caffeine.
